attributes.action: Dismiss any Senior Civil Servant who accepts gifts or hospitality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a civil servant. It is made clear to me that i must not accept any gift or hospitality. It is made clear to my staff who have no influence on any contract. These people, if they are shown to have accepted anything, must be dismissed - without pension or payoff - they bring the service into disrepute.

rejection.details: There are already disciplinary procedures in place dealing with this issue and as you say yourself, it is made clear to civil servants that they must not accept hospitality or gifts where there is a conflict of interest.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
